name: 60-min brainstorm
description:
A long overdue update to your Remote Design Sprint template, that will help you generate a wide range of solutions to a small design challenge.


In this file you'll find various tasks and assets to help you set up a 1h-long brainstorm with your team. This is a variation of the original Google Sprint recipe, that I refined to yield a better result in a remote setup.


Feel free to let me know if you have feedback, or if you have template ideas that I can help build: @killnicole.
